TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComSoapPublisher

summary.span: 为启用 SOAP 的 COM+ 应用程序发布 COM 接口。

span.span: Publishes COM interfaces for SOAP-enabled COM+ applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的实现 是 ; 有关详细信息，请参阅该主题。The implementation of is ; see that topic for specifics. 由 .NET Framework 在内部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 不需要直接在代码中使用它。You do not need to use it directly in your code.

summary.span: 返回 SoapCache 目录中生成的强名称签名程序集的完整路径。

span.span: Returns the full path for a strong-named signed generated assembly in the SoapCache directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于要通过 .NET 远程处理作为 SOAP 终结点发布的非托管 COM + 组件，需要生成代理以使非托管组件可用于 .NET Framework。For an unmanaged COM+ component to be published through .NET remoting as a SOAP endpoint, a proxy needs to be generated to make the unmanaged components available to the .NET Framework. 这是通过以编程方式执行与类型库导入程序相同的步骤来实现 ( # A0) ，这是用于将非托管 COM + 类型库转换为代理元数据程序集的 Windows SDK 工具。This is done by programmatically performing the same steps as Type Library Importer (Tlbimp.exe), the Windows SDK tool that is used to convert unmanaged COM+ type libraries to proxy metadata assemblies. 但是，若要使通过 SOAP 的客户端激活成功，客户端和服务器计算机必须共享相同的强名称签名元数据代理。For client activation over SOAP to succeed, however, client and server machines must share the same strong-named signed metadata proxies. 出于此原因，为非托管 COM + 组件生成了托管代理程序集时，还会生成一个强名称密钥并用于对代理程序集进行签名。For this reason, when a managed proxy assembly is generated for an unmanaged COM+ component, a strong name key is also generated and used to sign the proxy assembly.

exception.span: 在字符串中间包含一个冒号 (:)。

span.span: contains a colon (:) in the middle of the string.

summary.span: 处理客户端类型库，在客户端上创建配置文件。

span.span: Processes a client type library, creating a configuration file on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于客户端代理导入，以生成远程处理配置文件。This method is used on a client proxy import to generate a remoting configuration file. 在实现中，如果 `Mode` 参数为 "wellknownobject" 或空字符串 ( "" ) ，则假定为已知对象; 否则，将采用客户端激活。In the implementation, if the `Mode` parameter is either "wellknownobject" or an empty string (""), a well-known object is assumed; otherwise, client activation is assumed. 建议 使用而不是 。It is recommended that be used instead of .

Generates a proxy if necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的实现 使用 Regasm.exe 取消注册程序集中的可创建类。The implementation of uses Regasm.exe to unregister the creatable classes in the assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [)Regasm.exe (程序集注册工具 ](/dotnet/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool)。For more information, see [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](/dotnet/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool).

exception.span: 调用链中的调用方无权访问非托管代码。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.

exception.span: 用两个不同的证据将一个程序集或模块加载了两次，或程序集名称超过系统指定的最大长度。

span.span: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences, or the assembly name exceeds the system-defined maximum length.
